ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | iscms.1 | |- X = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | iscms.2 | |- D = ( ( dist ` M ) |` ( X X. X ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_iscms | |- ( M e. CMetSp <-> ( M e. MetSp /\ D e. ( CMet ` X ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simprbi | |- ( M e. CMetSp -> D e. ( CMet ` X ) ) |
